lunaCreatives.title: Luna Creatives - Internship
lunaCreatives.desc: During my tenure at Luna Creatives as an intern and as part of Learning in the Workforce (LIA), I assumed responsibility for Frontend development with integrated Backend tasks. My primary project centered around creating an educational tool tailored for primary schools.

qualifications.desc: Proficient in React, TypeScript, NodeJS, MongoDB, and GraphQL, I specialize in crafting dynamic web solutions. From intuitive interfaces using React and TypeScript to robust Backends with NodeJS and MongoDB, my expertise ensures efficient and innovative digital solutions.
